news_header: Indian shares showed mixed performance ahead of the RBI's interest rate decision, with some companies reporting earnings changes.
news_original_title: Sensex, Nifty Struggle For Direction Ahead Of RBI Verdict
news_text: Indian shares struggled for direction on Friday as investors awaited the Reserve Bank of India's interest-rate decision. The RBI is expected to cut the benchmark repurchase rate by 25 basis points to 6.25 percent, with some analysts predicting a larger cut. The S&P/BSE Sensex was slightly higher at 78,085, while the NSE Nifty index remained stable at 23,608. Notable stock movements included Mahindra & Mahindra rising 1%, LIC falling 1%, and Bharti Airtel jumping 4.5% after a significant profit increase.
